DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety tolerability oral Farnesyl Protein Transferase Inhibitor ( SCH 66336 ) give combination intravenous docetaxel cancer patient advance solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Farnesyl Protein Transferase Inhibitor ( FPTI ) Combination With Docetaxel Advanced Solid Tumors ( Study P01964 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Male Female Measurable evaluable disease No 2 prior chemotherapy regimen . Age great equal 18 . Karnofsky Performance Status great equal 70 % . Meets protocol requirement specify laboratory value . No manifestation malabsorption syndrome . Written inform consent cooperation patient Appropriate use effective contraception childbearing potential . Exclusion : Acute chronic leukemia multiple myeloma . Evidence 2 active malignancy , expect situ adequately treat basal squamous cell skin cancer .
